response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit and enhance your business operations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents an excellent opportunity to secure such a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly. I look forward to the possibility of working with you on this exciting venture.", "product_price": 950000}
